extdist-no-such-extensions:
This message indicates the extension doesn't exist in the extensions list. Parameters:
* $1 - extension name
extdist-no-such-skins:
This message indicates the skin doesn't exist in the skins list. Parameters:
* $1 - skin name
extdist-no-such-version-extensions:
This message indicates the specified version of the extension doesn't exist. Parameters:
* $1 - extension name
* $2 - version number of the extension
extdist-no-such-version-skins:
This message indicates the specified version of the skin doesn't exist. Parameters:
* $1 - skin name
* $2 - version number of the skin
extdist-choose-extensions:
Used as intro message in [[Special:ExtensionDistributor]].

This message is followed by the Extension Selector form.
extdist-choose-skins:
Used as intro message in [[Special:SkinDistributor]].

This message is followed by the Skin Selector form.
extdist-choose-version-extensions:
This message is followed by the select box which enables to select a MediaWiki version.

Parameters:
* $1 - extension name
extdist-choose-version-skins:
This message is followed by the select box which enables to select a MediaWiki version.

Parameters:
* $1 - skin name
extdist-no-versions-skins: This error message means that the skin can't be downloaded, because no release (version) was ever defined for it.
extdist-created-extensions:
Followed by the link text {{msg-mw|Extdist-want-more-extensions}}.

In the expression "extensions directory", "extensions" is the name of an actual directory and should not be translated.

Parameters:
* $1 - extension name
* $2 - revision number (SHA1, 7 characters)
* $3 - branch name. e.g. master, REL1_21, REL1_20
* $4 - URL which points to the .tar.gz file
* $5 - filename of the .tar.gz file
extdist-created-skins:
Followed by the link text {{msg-mw|Extdist-want-more-skins}}.

In the expression "skins directory", "skins" is the name of an actual directory and should not be translated.

Parameters:
* $1 - skin name
* $2 - revision number (SHA1, 7 characters)
* $3 - branch name. e.g. master, REL1_21, REL1_20
* $4 - URL which points to the .tar.gz file
* $5 - filename of the .tar.gz file
extdist-want-more-extensions:
Used as link text in [[Special:ExtensionDistributor]].

This message follows the Download icon.
extdist-want-more-skins:
Used as link text in [[Special:SkinDistributor]].

This message follows the Download icon.
extdist-goto-extensions-page:
Used as link text in [[Special:ExtensionDistributor]].

This message precedes the "Want more" message ({{int:extdist-want-more-extensions}}).

* $1 is the name of the extension they just finished downloading
extdist-goto-skins-page:
Used as link text in [[Special:SkinDistributor]].

This message precedes the "Want more" message.
extdist-tar-error: Used as error message in [[Special:ExtensionDistributor]], when downloading an extension.
extdist-no-branches: Error message shown if it can't find any information about any branches
extdist-popular-extensions: Message shown before a list of popular extensions. $1 is the number of items in the list.
extdist-popular-skins: Message shown before a list of popular skins. $1 is the number of items in the list
extdist-branch-alpha: Message for the latest alpha/development version for an extension. "master" is the version, and should not be translated.
extdist-branch-candidate: Message for the version that is the next stable candidate. $1 is the version name
extdist-branch-stable: Message for the current stable MediaWiki version. $1 is the version name.
